name: Well Well Well
description:
My INCOMPLETE submission for Brackey's August 2020 Game Jam. The theme of this jam was "Rewind" so I decided to think outside of the box and make a game where you wind and REWIND cranks to move buckets up and down to fetch coins from the bottom of a well. I spent most of my time on art, and was unable to complete the game. I may one day revisit this project and make this into a fully playable game some day. But for now, enjoy this barely playable prototype.

Controls:

Left / Right - Move your character

Up / Down while standing on a well - Wind and rewind the crank to move the bucket people up and down

Objective:

Catch coins and bring them to the top.

Music composed by Aaron Bonneau!
